title: Be Your X
lyrics:
Paroles de la chanson Be Your X par T-Pain
I just wanna be your ex
Boop boop
Boop boop
Boop boop
I just wanna be the one that you can't forget
Boop boop
Boop boop

I just wanna be the nigga that you keep saying ain't shit
The same nigga that provide you that dank dick
The same nigga that you ride to the bank with
Your new nigga can't fuck and he can't lick (uuhhh)
I'm the one that had you on that A-list (uhhh)
Think you living life but it ain't at all

Said that I was cheating but I can't recall
So it ain't my fault

Cause I just wanna be your ex (ohh)
AKA the best you've ever had (yuh)
Just call me for sex
I can hear my ex calling and I answer (yuh)
Cause I just wanna be your ex (ohh)
AKA the best you've ever had (yuh)
Just call me for sex
I can hear my ex calling and I answer (yuh)

Cause I just want to be the one that you can't forget (yeah)
I can't wait for that next call cause I'll answer
And I just wanna be the one you can't forget (yeah)
I can't wait for that next call cause I'll answer


I just wanna be that nigga that had you riding that Rolls Royce (yep)
Doors open up for you, girl you got no choice (yep)
Had you screaming all night you got no voice (yep)
She walk up in the mansion all she say is oh boy (uhhh)
Call your man and tell him that's it's over (uhhh)
I ain't gonna have you fucking with no more bums
All you do is call and you know I come, if you want you some

Cause I just wanna be your ex (ohh)
AKA the best you've ever had
Just call me for sex

I can hear my ex calling and I answer (yuh)
Cause I just wanna be your ex (ohh)
AKA the best you've ever had
Just call me for sex
I can hear my ex calling and I answer (yuh)

Cause I just want to be the one that you can't forget
I can't wait for that next call cause I'll answer
And I just wanna be the one you can't forget (yeaaah)
I can't wait for that next call cause I'll answer
